GStreamer Good Plugins 0.10 Plugins Reference Manual

debug

— elements for testing and debugging

Plugin Information

filename libgstdebug.so
version 0.10.7
run-time license LGPL
package GStreamer Good Plug-ins source release
origin Unknown package origin

Elements

breakmydata randomly change data in the stream
navseek Seek based on navigation keys left-right
progressreport Periodically query and report on processing progress
rndbuffersize pull random sized buffers
testsink perform a number of tests
